TopicTitle: What do you think of my ksp painting

Articles.Content: Keep practicing with photo/screenshot reference. Use straight line tool for mechanical structures. Definitely work on smooth blending, thatÃ‚Â´s a big one, if you want to go for a realistic view. Well actually itÃ‚Â´s a big one for pretty much everything except very simple comic styles.

Very nice.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-13T23:41:06Z" title="07/13/2015 11:41  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 13, 2015</time> by Master Tao**
I can tell you put effort into this, nice job. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
The capsule is a little off, but the rest is spot on. Much better than anything I could do.
That's a pretty nice painting, but I feel bad for the pilot, he doesn't seem to have a parachute. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
